header.heading: Profile
header.description: Customize your profile by changing your avatar, personal information, and social media links. Make your profile visible to others and stand out!

avatar.heading: Profile Picture

confirmModal.heading: Delete
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete your profile picture? This action cannot be undone.

avatar.info: You can upload images in JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP, or GIF formats. Maximum file size is 10 MB.
avatar.successUpdateMessage: Your profile picture was updated successfully!
avatar.errorUpdateMessage: Something went wrong while updating your profile picture. Please try again.
avatar.errorRemoveMessage: Something went wrong while deleting your avatar. Please try again.

socialLinks.noData: Links to social networks not found
socialLinks.noDataSpan: Add links to your social networks to make your profile more personal and unique.

header.heading: Account
header.description: Manage your account settings, including access changes, security, and deactivation options.
header.securityDescription: Set up two-factor authentication for enhanced data protection.

twoFactor.heading: TOTP Authentication
twoFactor.description: Enhance the security of your account by enabling TOTP authentication. This extra layer of protection requires a unique code, making your account less vulnerable to unauthorized access.

enable.heading: Enable TOTP
enable.qrInstructions: Scan the QR code to add TOTP

disable.heading: Are you sure you want to disable TOTP?
disable.message: Disabling TOTP authentication will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to proceed?

register.head: Sign up
register.heading: Create an account
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
register.successAlertDescription: A verification email has been sent to your inbox. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder

login.head: Sign in
login.heading: Welcome back!
login.backButtonLabel: Don't have an account? Sign up!
login.loginDescription: Your username or email that you used during registration.
login.pinDescription: Enter the code from your authentication app.

resetPassword.heading: Password reset
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We have sent a link to reset your password to your email. If you have notifications enabled in Telegram, the link has been sent there as well
resetPassword.errorMessage: User with this email address was not found

newPassword.heading: New password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
newPassword.passwordDescription: The password you used during registration
newPassword.passwordRepeatDescription: Repeat your new password for confirmation
newPassword.errorMessage: Error when setting a new password
